title: my solution to autostart a specific connection then close mRemoteNG when this connection is closed
author: petit982
body_snippet:
Hi all,
I'm using mRemoteNG since YESTERDAY because I had issues with Windows standard RDP connection (freeze every 1 min).
With mRemoteNG, same server, same user, same PC >>> ZERO PROBLEMS... PERFECT...

But I noticed mRemoteNG had a few limitations:
- no way to open a specific connection at startup
- no way to auto-close mRemoteNG after this connection have been closed


So I wrote a BAT script to make the following: 
-1- search the string Connected="false" in the config file ...\App...

comments.snippet: Thanks you you save my life !
